Text: dude how come u released LOST in HDTV H264 instead of the 360p which is of better???

READ THE SCHEDULE - it's posted as header of all regular shows.

>..."Wednesday: NCIS, NCIS LA, Lost, White Collar, The Good Wife (maybe next day) as MP4 H264; ~3.48 MB/minute"

Lost have been encoded as 360p ONLY last two weeks due to diluted schedule 'cause of Winter Olympics.

Further read:

">twentyforty at 2010-02-17 10:49 CET:
Thanks people. Slow day today, and I have encoded Lost as 360p. It was exception, right? And I guess nobody objects to that.

>mona666 at 2010-03-02 15:11 CET:
2040 - like your .mp4 posts (for PSP)!!... Also, how come LOST resolution settings different from other shows? No complaints just noticed.

>twentyforty at 2010-03-02 15:35 CET:
@mona: 'cause somebody asked nicely to encode Lost as 360p.
I've promised nothing, but said that I do it whenever I can. In past two weeks it happened twice. What else? I am great Lost fan, I guess.

However, 360p is nothing unusual, for instance today three shows have been encoded as 360p, three as 480x272. Mainly, it's size issue (LOL), most of my "regulars" expect and prefer shows under 145MB and movies under 350."

Last comment was - yesterday. Must I explain every decision? Nope. But I did.

Thanks 20/40.
This is still one of the better shows.
